BookFile.Header:
Save as Unicode UTF-8 text encoding. Skip section 2 in Part 1. Also ingored section 35 which consisted of collected observations from observatories.
For volume AJB 10 Index to the Literature of 1908, started 28 Nov 2019, finished, proofread
